import React, { Component } from 'react' import School from "./school"; import Personal from "./personal"; import { Button, Header, Icon, Image, Menu, Segment, Sidebar } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class SideBar extends Component { state = { visible: false } handleHideClick = () => this.setState({ visible: false }) handleShowClick = () => this.setState({ visible: true }) handleSidebarHide = () => this.setState({ visible: false }) render() { const { visible } = this.state return (
Application Content
) } }
